job_title: IT Data Manager in Sunderland, North East England, England
pros: I've been working at MHM for a while now and I can confidently say that it is one of the better companies I've worked for. The company culture is incredibly supportive and inclusive, and I feel valued as an employee. The management team is transparent and approachable, and the staff genuinely care about the roles they perform. I feel fortunate to be a part of such an amazing team, and I would recommend MHM to anyone looking for a fulfilling and rewarding career in social care.
cons: These are more from my perspective due to moving industry sectors but the level of jargon and acronyms in social care at time be a little overwhelming.
